event.description: Ben Francisco grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Asdrubal Cabrera lines out to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
Victor Martinez turns around to bat right-handed.
Victor Martinez walks.
Mark DeRosa strikes out swinging.
David Dellucci called out on strikes.
Ryan Garko flies out to left fielder Jason Bay.
Jhonny Peralta called out on strikes.
Matt LaPorta walks.
Luis Valbuena grounds into a force out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to shortstop Nick Green. Matt LaPorta out at 2nd. Luis Valbuena to 1st.
Ben Francisco grounds into a double play, third baseman Mike Lowell to second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Jeff Bailey. Luis Valbuena out at 2nd.
Asdrubal Cabrera singles on a line drive to right fielder J. D. Drew.
Victor Martinez turns around to bat right-handed.
With Victor Martinez batting, Asdrubal Cabrera steals (5) 2nd base.

David Dellucci hit by pitch.
Ryan Garko walks. David Dellucci to 2nd.
Jhonny Peralta grounds out, third baseman Mike Lowell to first baseman Jeff Bailey.

Luis Valbuena doubles (1) on a soft line drive to left fielder Jason Bay. Matt LaPorta to 3rd.
With Ben Francisco batting, passed ball by George Kottaras, Matt LaPorta scores. Luis Valbuena to 3rd.

Asdrubal Cabrera out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Rocco Baldelli. Luis Valbuena scores. Ben Francisco to 2nd.
Victor Martinez turns around to bat right-handed.

Victor Martinez walks.

Pitching Change: Javier Lopez replaces Manny Delcarmen.
Victor Martinez grounds out, shortstop Nick Green to first baseman Jeff Bailey.
